mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Promoter_tbl(promoter_id, pmtLoginId, pmtLoginPw, pmtGender, pmtFirstName, pmtLastName, pmtMail, pmtPhone, pmtCellularPhone) VALUES(#{promoter_id}, #{pmtLoginId}, #{pmtLoginPw}, '-99', #{pmtName}, #{pmtName}, #{pmtMail}, #{pmtPhone}, #{pmtCellularPhone})
mapper.select: select IFNULL(max(promoter_id+1) , 10001000) AS promoter_id from Promoter_tbl
select pmtLoginId from Promoter_tbl where PmtLoginId = #{pmtLoginId};

select c.* from (select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, a.* from (select * from Promoter_tbl order by promoter_id) a, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R ) c where c.ROWNUM >= #{startRow} and c.ROWNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT snsPromoter_id , spPromoterId , spFirstName , spLastName , spMiddleName , spNickname , spEmail , spGender , spProfileImage , spURL , promoter_id FROM SnsPromoter_tbl WHERE 1=1 AND spPromoterId = #{spPromoterId}
SELECT CASE WHEN T2.pmtCertifyDt IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CertifyDtYN FROM Promoter_tbl T1 JOIN PromoterValue_tbl T2 ON T1.promoter_id = T2.promoter_id WHERE T1.promoter_id = #{promoter_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE PromoterValue_tbl SET pmtCertifyDt = NOW() WHERE promoter_id = #{promoter_id}
mapper.select: SELECT T1.promoter_id, T1.pmtLoginId, T1.pmtLoginPw, T1.pmtGender, T1.pmtFirstName, T1.pmtLastName, T1.pmtMiddleName, T1.pmtNickName , T1.pmtMail, T1.pmtPhone, T1.pmtCellularPhone, T1.pmtAddrFlag, T1.pmtZipcode, T1.pmtAddress, T1.pmtAddressDetail, T1.pmtJobType, T1.pmtMarried, T1.pmtMark, T1.pmtRcmderId , T2.pmtCertifyDt FROM Promoter_tbl T1 JOIN PromoterValue_tbl T2 ON T1.promoter_id = T2.promoter_id WHERE pmtLoginId = #{pmtLoginId} AND pmtLoginPw = #{pmtLoginPw}
